Reps Committee Urges Immediate Cleanup Of Buguma Oil Spill, Fire Incident
Published by
Daily Independent
on Thu, 06 Mar 2025
ABUJAThe Chairman of the House of Representatives Committee on Environment, Rt. Hon. Pondi Julius Gbabojor, has called for the immediate commencement of cleanup operations in communities affected by an oil spill and fire incident at Well 8 in Buguma, Degema Local Government Area of Rivers State.
